alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 10 at 10:55AM EST until December 10 at 11:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EST FOR EASTERN WAKULLA AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 1054 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crawfordville to 9 miles south of St. Marks to 25 miles east of Carrabelle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Newport, Hyde Park, Tully, Plum Orchard, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Spring Creek, and Liveoak Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for Big Bend Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
